mapper.insert: insert into user(userName, userEmail, userPwd, userBirth, userGender, userPhoneNumber) values (#{userName},#{userEmail},#{userPwd},#{userBirth},#{userGender},#{userPhoneNumber})
mapper.select: select userEmail, userName from user where userEmail = #{userEmail} and userPwd = #{userPwd} and userCertification > 0
update user set userPwd = #{userNewPwd} where userEmail = #{userEmail} and userPwd = #{userPwd}
select count(*) from user where userEmail = #{userEmail} and userPwd = #{userPwd}
select * from user where sessionKey = #{value} and sessionLimit > now()
mapper.update: update user set userCertification = 1 where (select count(*) from userAuth where userEmail = #{userEmail}) > 0
